id.description: Identifier for the layer. Building scene layer id is not in the same namespace as sublayer id. **Important**: clients should **not** assume it will be `0`.

alias.description: Alias of the layer name. Can be empty if alias and name are identical.

version.description: Version of the building scene layer

fullExtent.description: 3d extent. If `layer.fullExtent.spatialReference` is specified, it **must** match `layer.spatialReference`.

spatialReference.description: The spatialReference of the layer including the vertical coordinate system. WKT is included to support custom spatial references.

heightModelInfo.description: An object containing the vertical coordinate system information.

sublayers.description: List of sublayers or group of sublayers.

filters.description: Array of filters defined for the building scene layer.

activeFilterID.description: Global ID, filter ID of the currently active filter for the building scene layer.

statisticsHRef.description: url to statistic summary for the BIM layer. [statistics/summary.json](statsummary.md)
